Dear {!Application__c.Patient__c},
Thank you for submitting your application to the Susan G. Komen® Treatment Assistance Program. Your application has been received and will be processed as soon as possible.You will receive a notice once your application review is complete and a funding decision has been reached.
For questions or concerns regarding your application, please contact us directly at TreatmentAssistance@komen.org or 972-866-4233. sgkencrypt Warmly, Susan G. Komen
